snippet.title: Streets of Rage 4 Mr. X Nightmare - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Buy now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1585820/Streets_Of_Rage_4__Mr_X_Nightmare/
Buy now on PS4: https://store.playstation.com/fr-fr/product/EP1470-CUSA16221_00-SOR4SIEEDLC00001
Buy now on Xbox One: https://www.microsoft.com/en-gb/p/mr-x-nightmare/9n88q4qt2n25?activetab=pivot:overviewtab
Nintendo Switch is now available! Players need to launch Streets of Rage 4 on their Switch to find the DLC! 

Join the fight on Discord: https://discord.gg/8mHyhvxaw4​

Mr. X Nightmare is out now on PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and PC via Steam, GOG, and the Windows Store for $7.99. To celebrate the release we have  punched the base price of the game down by 40 percent on Steam and roundhouse-kicked 10 percent off the DLC price for PlayStation fans, and 15 percent off Steam and the Microsoft store PC versions from July 15 - July 29.

The DLC sees new features added to Streets of Rage 4 which encompassess several different areas: Playable new fighters, Survival Mode, New moves, New badass weaponry, Leaderboards, New Tunes and a separate free update. 

For all things Streets of Rage 4, visit www.streets4rage.com, check out www.facebook.com/StreetsofRage4, pummel @Dotemu, @Lizardcube, and @Guard_Crush’s follow buttons on Twitter, and join us on Discord: https://discord.gg/DvVq4yz.

Music by Tee Lopes

©SEGA, ©2021 Dotemu, all rights reserved. Developed by Lizardcube, Guard Crush Games and Dotemu
